item.title: Writing + Honors
item.description: Selected Publications “Cara” in Nat. Brut Issue 16, December 2022 “Techno Show” in X-R-A-Y Literary Magazine, August 2021 “Schrödinger’s Cat” in Barren Magazine Issue 19, August 2021 “A Happy Ending” in HAD, July 2021 “bone orchard” in Rejection Letters, July 2021 Honors 2023 PEN Emerging Voices Fellow 2023 & 2024 Periplus Fellowship Finalist 2021 Pushchart Prize Nomination for “Schrödinger’s Cat” by Barren Magazine Honorable Mention for the 2020 Felicia Farr Lemmon Poetry Prize from the Academy of American Poets

item.title: Experience
item.description: Experience Short story editor at Intergalactic Gaysians, Oct 2023–Current Fiction reader at Okay Donkey Magazine, Jan 2022–June 2024 Assistant poetry editor at Anomaly Journal, Nov 2021–June 2024 Workshops/Conferences Sewanee Writers’ Conference under Kirstin Chen, July 2023 CRIT under Tony Tulathimutte, March 2023 Tin House Summer Workshop under Lesley Nneka Arimah, July 2022 VONA Summer Workshop under Mathangi Subramanian, June 2022 Education English B.A., Computer Science B.A. at Brown University, 2013-2017

item.title: &Etc
item.description: Lists Inspiration the moon, the body, body horror, bodies of water, holes, desire, yearning, the strange & supernatural & surrealist, chinese folklore, the politics of revolution & solidarity, becoming & undoing, eggs, pills, computers, computer-generated poetry, simulations Books I Like Bliss Montage by Ling Ma: strange and evocative and beautiful, one of my favorite short story collections of all time!! I’m Waiting For You by Kim Bo-young: a speculative short story collection translated from Korean.

item.title: Datadog take-home assignment
item.description: Exercise 1: Collecting Metrics Postgres conf.yaml: init_config: instances: ## @param host - string - required ## The hostname to connect to. ## NOTE: Even if the server name is "localhost", the agent connects to ## PostgreSQL using TCP/IP, unless you also provide a value for the sock key. # - host: localhost ## @param port - integer - required ## Port to use when connecting to PostgreSQL. # port: 5432 ## @param user - string - required ## Datadog Username created to connect to PostgreSQL.
